fields.description:
Complete UI View methods / properties / events NOT required by Kitchen Sink

Add at least:

* Titanium.UI.View.animate
* Titanium.UI.View.append
* Titanium.UI.View.backgroundGradient
* Titanium.UI.View.borderColor
* Titanium.UI.View.borderRadius
* Titanium.UI.View.borderWidth
* Titanium.UI.View.control
* Titanium.UI.View.currentIndex
* Titanium.UI.View.currentY
* Titanium.UI.View.fireEvent
* Titanium.UI.View.id
* Titanium.UI.View.layout
* Titanium.UI.View.on
* Titanium.UI.View.refreshRssTable
* Titanium.UI.View.reset
* Titanium.UI.View.scrollView
* Titanium.UI.View.showArticle
* Titanium.UI.View.shuffle
* Titanium.UI.View.state
* Titanium.UI.View.titleId
* Titanium.UI.View.toggle
* Titanium.UI.View.toImage
* Titanium.UI.View.touchEnabled
* Titanium.UI.View.updateHandheldNav
* Titanium.UI.View.updateSubNav
* Titanium.UI.View.videoId
